name: Rohan Patel
occupation: Regional Head of Sales for a FinTech company with frequent international travel and high-stress demands
goals: Reduce risk of heart disease (due to family history) by maintaining healthy cholesterol and blood pressure levels by December 2026. Enhance cognitive function and focus for sustained mental performance in demanding work environment by June 2026. Implement annual full-body health screenings for early detection of debilitating diseases, starting November 2025
personality: Highly motivated and ready to act, but time-constrained. Needs clear, concise action plans and data-driven insights.
tech: Garmin watch (used for runs), considering Oura ring. Health apps / platforms (Trainerize, MyFitnessPal, Whoop).
